DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the impact of disease management interventions on bone mineral density screening rates and osteoporosis treatment rates in women age 50-64 years at high risk for osteoporosis.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Osteoporosis Disease Management Strategies (0000-039)
DOC.criteria: Members of the Harvard Pilgrim Health Plan Individuals who are not members of the Harvard Pilgrim Health Plan
